es.sn: Dijeron los Yoguis, nosotros vivimos en el bosque desapegados de los caminos mundanos.

en.bdb: For food, we take fruits and roots. This is the spiritual wisdom spoken by the renunciates.
en.ms: We take fruits and roots as our food, this is the gnosis, which the Yogis utter.
